titleStmt.title: A True and perfect narrative of the late dreadful famine in the great and populous city of Messina in the straits where vast multitudes of men, women, and children, have miserably perished in the streets, for want of food ... : with a description of the place, the occasions and manner of their revolting last summer from Spain, and putting themselves under the protection of the crown of France ... / extracted from several letters from Milan, Naples, and Palermo.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
